nodes.text: Pleth Juun was a Human woman, who became a surgeon and joined the military.

Juun was born into a wealthy family on the planet Coruscant and attended one of the world's most prestigious medical schools. She later joined the military, as a surgeon, and was given the rank of Lieutenant. While she was in her mid-twenties, she was present on the planet Pleida, where a conflict was being fought, and was attached to a battalion that was commanded by Captain Roff Volane. After a number of officers were injured at the base Camp Kavel, a team of agents were assigned by Volane to escort Juun there, so that she could administer treatment to the officers.

Pleth Juun was attractive, with gray eyes and cropped dark blond hair. Due to her privileged upbringing, she had a haughty demeanor and was arrogant and vindictive. She expected her orders to obeyed and if they weren't, she perceived it as an insult. However, she was a skilled surgeon and a loyal soldier.
